constraint.error-msg: The title of the project is required!
To indicate where the project will take place is required!
To explain why the project will take place at other place is required!
The lay summary of the project is required!
To indicate the primary intent of the project is required!
To indicate if this project would still be conducted as proposed if there were no possibility of any form of academic recognition for the project is required!
To indicate if the project involves obtaining information about living individuals is required!
To explain why or why not the project involves obtaining information about living individuals is required!
To indicate if the project involves intervention or interaction with living individuals is required!
To explain why or why not the project involves intervention or interaction with living individuals is required!
To indicate if the information that will be obtained individually is identifiable is required!
To explain why or why not the information that will be obtained individually is identifiable is required!
To indicate if the information about behaviors that occur in contexts in which individuals can reasonably expect that no observation or recording is taking place is required!
To explain why or why not the information about behaviors that occur in contexts in which individuals can reasonably expect that no observation or recording is taking place is required!
To indicate if the information provided by individuals for specific purposes, and can individuals reasonably expect the information will not be made public is required!
To explain why or why not the information provided by individuals for specific purposes, and can individuals reasonably expect the information will not be made public is required!
To indicate what the project will involve is required!
Principal Investigator is required for the study!
